events.description: Sri Lanka reported record-breaking foreign tourist arrivals for the month of January 2026.

facts.fact_text: Foreign tourist arrivals in Sri Lanka reached an all-time high of 277,327 in January 2026, a 9.7% year-on-year increase.

evidences.evidence_text: The number of foreign tourist arrivals in Sri Lanka rose by 9.7% year-on-year to an all-time high of 277,327 in January 2026

facts.fact_text: India contributed 52,061 tourists, representing 19% of total arrivals and a 20% increase from the previous year.

evidences.evidence_text: India remained the largest source market, contributing 52,061 tourists, up 20% year-on-year and accounting for 19% of total arrivals.

facts.fact_text: Arrivals from the Russian Federation contracted by 13.4% year-on-year.

evidences.evidence_text: The Russian Federation, despite remaining the second-largest source market with 29,540 arrivals, saw a contraction of 13.4% compared to a year ago.

facts.fact_text: The UK market grew by 24.9% to 27,134 visitors.

evidences.evidence_text: The UK rose to third place with 27,134 visitors, up 24.9%.

claims.claim_text: The winter tourism season peaked later and stronger than usual in 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: The strong performance suggested the winter season peaked later and stronger than usual, as the month outperformed December 2025, defying the typical holiday-driven pattern.

claims.claim_text: January's arrival figures provide a solid start toward the annual target of 3 million visitors.
claims.author: Tourism authorities

evidences.evidence_text: Tourism authorities have set a 2026 target of 3 million visitors, and January’s figure already accounts for about 9.2% of that goal, offering a solid start to the year.

evidence.evidence_text: The strong performance suggested the winter season peaked later and stronger than usual, as the month outperformed December 2025
India remained the largest source market, contributing 52,061 tourists, up 20% year-on-year
The Russian Federation... saw a contraction of 13.4% compared to a year ago.
